dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I'll try to blend in with the group and avoid drawing too much attention to myself. Maybe I'll share some innocent conversation topics or express concern for the safety of our group, while keeping a low profile.

dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I'd like to propose that we share some lighthearted stories to help ease any tension and keep our spirits up. It might also give us some clues about each other if we pay close attention to the details of the stories.

dialogue.message: I'd like to propose that we share some lighthearted stories as Charlie suggested. However, I'll be paying extra close attention to the details of your stories, Alice, to ensure the safety of our group.
